channel.title: Hi, I'm Puru and and I run Terminusapp.com
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I am Puru and I am bootstrapping Terminus (www.terminusapp.com). It's a SaaS app that helps marketers build and manage UTM tracking URLs.
For the past 7-8 months, I have been working on Terminus during weekends and weeknights. It has been very exhausting. But I finally got my first paying customer this week. I still have a long way to go.
I live in the San Francisco bay area. If anyone wants to meet for a cup of coffee, I would definitely love to do that.
I am glad to have found this forum and see so many experienced and well-known bootstrappers here.
Also, it looks like quite a few people from here are going to Microconf 2014 in LV. I am going as well and I look forward to meeting some of you there.

item.title: Hi, I'm Puru and and I run Terminusapp.com
item.dc:creator: Ken
item.description:
Congrats on the first paying customer!

I’m still in the nights and weekends phase.

Hope to meet you at MicroConf!

Read full topic
